⟨ Home

Hitchens

Coursework for CMU 16-726 Image Synthesis taught by Jun-Yan Zhu.

Theme

An inarguably well-designed Jekyll theme by Pat Dryburgh.

Development

To set up your environment to develop this theme, run bundle install.

The theme is setup just like a normal Jekyll site. To test the theme, run bundle exec jekyll serve and open your browser at http://localhost:4000. This starts a Jekyll server using the theme. Add pages, documents, data, etc. like normal to test the themeâ€™s contents. As you make modifications to the theme and to your content, your site will regenerate and you should see the changes in the browser after a refresh, just like normal.
